body:
[An interesting broadcast on the subject from CBS](https://youtu.be/URGhMw1u7MM)

Shoving tons of women onto the front-line of combat is not just stupid, but it also compromises the integrity of our armed forces. My sister wants to join the marines. I advocated for her all the way. But I also reminded her that she was roughly half as strong as everyone else. And significantly less capable in a combat role. I didn't say this to discourage. Moreso to motivate her to try as hard as she can. Cause that's what she wants to do.

body: I don't think they understand just how much men have to give up for their physical edge either. Pretty much every kind of mental ability and intelligence and creativity except a few specific logic functions useful for fight strategy is nerfed in men once they go through puberty. Everything is a trade-off, and frankly this raw laboring skillset is obsolete except for those "men's jobs" which there's hardly any demand for in modern society. Outside of those, men are at a serious disadvantage biologically.

body: That's not a fair comparison because it wasn't until very recently that women were allowed to do anything other than raise kids. Often times they still did work on things but their husband or another male associate had to present their work for them because they wouldn't have been allowed to. This was not uncommon either, it happened a lot. Even now, girls tend to be too preoccupied with makeup and gossiping to have much ambition for anything else, but biologically they are cognitively superior even if most of them nurture it so little that it doesn't appear that way, and brain scans confirm this. It is no accident that activities involving thinking and feeling are seen as feminine. It's perfectly logical for the world up until a few hundred years ago too, while the men are busy laboring and fighting someone else has to fulfill the nonphysical tasks. Basically what this results in is that female geniuses are rarer currently, but the ones that exist are beyond insane. > You contradict yourself several times. First off, ‚Äúit wasn‚Äôt up until recently that women were ALLOWED to do anything other than raise kids‚Äù how does someone superior allow themselves to be held back by an inferior?

You're thinking in black and white. Men did and mostly still do run society. They are usually better leaders as they have less of a tendency to be clouded by emotions.

> ‚ÄúGirls are too preoccupied with makeup and gossiping‚Äù so you‚Äôre saying that all these thots and E-thots out there would be out writing physics papers and inventing clean sustainable energy if it wasn‚Äôt for all those issues of teen Vogue out there?

Yes because every single honors class and college I have seen the boys are usually stumped and the girls solve all the problems for them. And their dominance in the creative fields is even more significant. Men have almost zero ability to create, which makes sense as fantasizing too much would distract from their historical duties. Even on ruqqus notice how almost everyone is male yet perhaps even a slight majority of the top users are female.

> So no, most girls wouldn‚Äôt be super smart if they just put the makeup down

Not most, but still considerably smarter than the men. I dare you to say people like sfrohne aren't fucking savants in almost every aspect.

Literally because of lower participation rates. People who work because they enjoy it are extremely lucky, most people are merely doing it to provide for themselves and this is usually not a woman's task. But tell me how many grown men you know that actually have real hobbies vs the women.

> Women are typically around the median for IQ in any given population and men are on both ends of the IQ spectrum.

Like I said it's because of their attitude. This is mostly biological too but can be changed and have more exceptions unlike inherent lack of ability and skill ceilings. So there ends up being far fewer in number but those few are more successful than the men on average. While nurture can't compensate for nature both are required for full potential, and brain scans have proven that male brains are less symmetrical and that they don't have as many functions as female ones, and even out of the ones they do have they are not capable of using as many of them. Even so I must ask you, in ancient times when all the men had to be occupied with labor and fighting, who do you think was doing everything else?

body:
Bullshit.

Men and women are fundamentally different.

Men have a much wider bell-curve than women, when it comes to intelligence. Women tend more toward the average, so while you will find a lot more genius level men than you will women, you will also find more idiot level men than you will women. (Genius takes training, though, which is why there are so many more apparently stupid men than there are brilliant ones. Training is hard, and idiocy is easy.)

There are genius level women, just as there are female idiots. But the vast majority of them tend toward the average.

parent.body: I don't think they understand just how much men have to give up for their physical edge either. Pretty much every kind of mental ability and intelligence and creativity except a few specific logic functions useful for fight strategy is nerfed in men once they go through puberty. Everything is a trade-off, and frankly this raw laboring skillset is obsolete except for those "men's jobs" which there's hardly any demand for in modern society. Outside of those, men are at a serious disadvantage biologically.

body:
Women wrote the code to go to the moon. A woman created X-ray technology. Some even speculate many of Einstein's breakthroughs came from his WIFE, but because of his ego and society, she wasn't allowed to publish and reach the same level in her career. Do you even KNOW how Rosalind Franklin Is? Probably not. She is a pioneer of DNA research---that you just claimed in your post was the purview of .... Men. How about Barbara McClintock, also a genetic researcher who won a Nobel Prize? Do you know why you don't know about them? Men like you have dismissed and marginalized their contributions by constantly claiming (erroneously) that MEN are more intelligent. Not only are you factually wrong, you're ignorant, which is even worse. 

The most intelligent person on Earth, with the highest IQ, is a woman. Marilyn Vos Savant has the highest IQ on record according to the Guinness Book of World Records. 

Do more women gravitate toward the social, rather than the hard, sciences? Yes. As a matter of personality women are more prone toward less scientific fields. That doesn't make them less intelligent than men---it's simply a matter of interest and perspective. In an alt-universe where social sciences are more respected, Women would be the innovators. But personality and interest doesn't make you Less intelligent. It only means your interests are different. 

Not only are most men ignorant of women's contributions, they're narcissistic. The only thing that matters to you, are the things you're interested in. The only things that mean anything are the things Men believe are relevant. But the world doesn't revolve around you and what you think is important. Facts don't care about your feelings. Women are just as capable, just as intelligent, and just as accomplished as men. When you acknowledge that fact, maybe they'll get more respect for their contributions.

You contradict yourself several times. First off, ‚Äúit wasn‚Äôt up until recently that women were ALLOWED to do anything other than raise kids‚Äù how does someone superior allow themselves to be held back by an inferior?  

‚ÄúGirls are too preoccupied with makeup and gossiping‚Äù so you‚Äôre saying that all these thots and E-thots out there would be out writing physics papers and inventing clean sustainable energy if it wasn‚Äôt for all those issues of teen Vogue out there?  Sorry, not buying it. Clearly you are not someone that is a few standard deviations above the mean for IQ points. 

If you were you‚Äôd know it‚Äôs not something you can just ignore when the whole world reminds you how stupid they are at every turn.  This conversation is an excellent example of that. So no, most girls wouldn‚Äôt be super smart if they just put the makeup down. Females have every advantage in science and technology fields, affirmative action big time yet there are way less of them. Women are typically around the median for IQ in any given population and men are on both ends of the IQ spectrum. So the reason there are so few female geniuses isn‚Äôt because muh patriarchy it‚Äôs because men as a group occupy the upper echelons of IQ almost exclusively, they also congregate towards the bottom but it‚Äôs irrelevant to this argument. 

The smartest people who‚Äôve ever lived have been and will continue to be men unless we physically change that with genetic engineering which again was invented by men.

parent.body:
> You contradict yourself several times. First off, ‚Äúit wasn‚Äôt up until recently that women were ALLOWED to do anything other than raise kids‚Äù how does someone superior allow themselves to be held back by an inferior?

You're thinking in black and white. Men did and mostly still do run society. They are usually better leaders as they have less of a tendency to be clouded by emotions.

> ‚ÄúGirls are too preoccupied with makeup and gossiping‚Äù so you‚Äôre saying that all these thots and E-thots out there would be out writing physics papers and inventing clean sustainable energy if it wasn‚Äôt for all those issues of teen Vogue out there?

Yes because every single honors class and college I have seen the boys are usually stumped and the girls solve all the problems for them. And their dominance in the creative fields is even more significant. Men have almost zero ability to create, which makes sense as fantasizing too much would distract from their historical duties. Even on ruqqus notice how almost everyone is male yet perhaps even a slight majority of the top users are female.

> So no, most girls wouldn‚Äôt be super smart if they just put the makeup down

Not most, but still considerably smarter than the men. I dare you to say people like sfrohne aren't fucking savants in almost every aspect.

> Females have every advantage in science and technology fields, affirmative action big time yet there are way less of them.

Literally because of lower participation rates. People who work because they enjoy it are extremely lucky, most people are merely doing it to provide for themselves and this is usually not a woman's task. But tell me how many grown men you know that actually have real hobbies vs the women.

> Women are typically around the median for IQ in any given population and men are on both ends of the IQ spectrum.

Like I said it's because of their attitude. This is mostly biological too but can be changed and have more exceptions unlike inherent lack of ability and skill ceilings. So there ends up being far fewer in number but those few are more successful than the men on average. While nurture can't compensate for nature both are required for full potential, and brain scans have proven that male brains are less symmetrical and that they don't have as many functions as female ones, and even out of the ones they do have they are not capable of using as many of them. Even so I must ask you, in ancient times when all the men had to be occupied with labor and fighting, who do you think was doing everything else?

body:
If it isn't fair, then women maybe shouldn't compete in the first place. The evolutionary purpose of watching sports as entertainment is to have an example of the competent in an area and establish a hierarchy that determines it. If you watch a handicapped version you are fooling yourself with some useless meta purpose. Does it mean nobody should watch lower leagues? Not necessarily but  it's with the prospect potential of them advancing, or just relatives or someone you know directly.

Just saying what seems rational to me. Of course if there's a demand for women only sports then who am I to deny that supply.

body:
Yeah because all most of them care about is makeup and gossiping. Nearly every single time one of them is actually productive they excel ahead of the men. In every school and college I've seen the girls in the advanced classes have no trouble solving some of the problems that absolutely stump the guys, even though there's more of the latter. Obviously if you have 1000 boys and only 100 girls there will be more of everything from the boys. So yeah there are more male geniuses because they have a higher participation in that, but the few women top them. If you limit your sample to girls who act like they're from the same planet as us I guarantee you they will be the smarter ones (just look at ruqqus even, @sfrohne, @no_chill, @stars_in_blue_major, @LlamaBean, @AngstKitten, @Madje, etc; ruqqus is more attractive to men so the girly girls won't use it. But with a mostly male userbase I think the top users may even have a slight female majority, simply because they're generally more talented than the guys. Even the ones who aren't top users are still usually smarter and more creative, they just aren't as active (ex. @gaycuttlefish). Another difference I've noted is that some of them produce their own content quite often while the guys almost never do, nor can they produce acceptable results (I've tried). I don't think it's an accident that all the creative endeavors are looked upon as feminine). Brain scans have shown that men not only have less of a brain (especially on the right side) but don't even use as many of the functions they do have. Men are made for laboring, providing, leading, and fighting, which means that they will have good strategy ability as it relates to those tasks but that's about it, everything else is severely limited as it would get in the way. This is kind of obsolete in modern society but men still haven't adapted. It essentially boils down to the hard work vs talent debate, men are usually more hard working but the women have more raw talent. If the latter doesn't work hard then the former will be able to beat them, but if it works even a little bit hard the former will be working their tail off and not even come close.

And no, I never denied that men and women are fundamentally different, that's literally my whole point. Men are built for more physical roles in society while women are suited for the intellectual and creative ones. Those are completely opposite functions, to the point where they're basically mutually exclusive.

If you limit your sample to girls who act like they're from the same planet as us I guarantee you they will be the smarter ones (just look at ruqqus even, @sfrohne, @no_chill, @stars_in_blue_major, @LlamaBean, @AngstKitten, @Madje, etc; ruqqus is more attractive to men so the girly girls won't use it. But with a mostly male userbase I think the top users may even have a slight female majority, simply because they're generally more talented than the guys. Even the ones who aren't top users are still usually smarter and more creative, they just aren't as active (ex. @gaycuttlefish). Another difference I've noted is that some of them produce their own content quite often while the guys almost never do, nor can they produce acceptable results (I've tried). I don't think it's an accident that all the creative endeavors are looked upon as feminine). Brain scans have shown that men not only have less of a brain (especially on the right side) but don't even use as many of the functions they do have. Men are made for laboring, providing, leading, and fighting, which means that they will have good strategy ability as it relates to those tasks but that's about it, everything else is severely limited as it would get in the way. This is kind of obsolete in modern society but men still haven't adapted. It essentially boils down to the hard work vs talent debate, men are usually more hard working but the women have more raw talent. If the latter doesn't work hard then the former will be able to beat them, but if it works even a little bit hard the former will be working their tail off and not even come close.

And no, I never denied that men and women are fundamentally different, that's literally my whole point. Men are built for more physical roles in society while women are suited for the intellectual and creative ones. Those are completely opposite functions, to the point where they're basically mutually exclusive.

parent.body:
Bullshit.

Men and women are fundamentally different.

Men have a much wider bell-curve than women, when it comes to intelligence. Women tend more toward the average, so while you will find a lot more genius level men than you will women, you will also find more idiot level men than you will women. (Genius takes training, though, which is why there are so many more apparently stupid men than there are brilliant ones. Training is hard, and idiocy is easy.)

There are genius level women, just as there are female idiots. But the vast majority of them tend toward the average.

body:
I'm not that smart but most men are even dumber than me. Why do you think Homer Simpson represents them so well?

In every single school I've been to, the boys in the advanced classes are stumped on a lot of problems the girls have no issues solving. I think it's a pretty safe bet to say that ruqqus attracts the nerdy types in which men outnumber women dramatically. However look at the top users on ruqqus, despite the almost entirely male userbase the women may even outnumber the men at that level. And even the ones who are not at that level, the female users generally act smarter and funnier and more creative, they're just not as active and could easily be at the top too if they were. All the most popular guilds on ruqqus who were not made by admins were created by only two users, both of whom are female. The male users almost exclusively repost other peoples' stuff and copy things while the female users are able to mix in some of their own work, and let's be honest their quality for both is just better. It's not because they're superior to the men but because in the way of intelligence, creativity, humor, socialization, etc. they are biologically primed for it whereas the men are for the opposite, physical or leadership roles. Women are generally the more "gifted and talented" types even though the majority of them don't foster it, so many men do end up surpassing them with hard work but are no match for the ones who have even the slightest bit of ambition.

parent.body:
Women wrote the code to go to the moon. A woman created X-ray technology. Some even speculate many of Einstein's breakthroughs came from his WIFE, but because of his ego and society, she wasn't allowed to publish and reach the same level in her career. Do you even KNOW how Rosalind Franklin Is? Probably not. She is a pioneer of DNA research---that you just claimed in your post was the purview of .... Men. How about Barbara McClintock, also a genetic researcher who won a Nobel Prize? Do you know why you don't know about them? Men like you have dismissed and marginalized their contributions by constantly claiming (erroneously) that MEN are more intelligent. Not only are you factually wrong, you're ignorant, which is even worse. 

The most intelligent person on Earth, with the highest IQ, is a woman. Marilyn Vos Savant has the highest IQ on record according to the Guinness Book of World Records. 

Do more women gravitate toward the social, rather than the hard, sciences? Yes. As a matter of personality women are more prone toward less scientific fields. That doesn't make them less intelligent than men---it's simply a matter of interest and perspective. In an alt-universe where social sciences are more respected, Women would be the innovators. But personality and interest doesn't make you Less intelligent. It only means your interests are different. 

Not only are most men ignorant of women's contributions, they're narcissistic. The only thing that matters to you, are the things you're interested in. The only things that mean anything are the things Men believe are relevant. But the world doesn't revolve around you and what you think is important. Facts don't care about your feelings. Women are just as capable, just as intelligent, and just as accomplished as men. When you acknowledge that fact, maybe they'll get more respect for their contributions.

Women claim to be as good as men at everything, but are proven wrong.

If this ends up happening, tell them I FUCKING CALLED IT!

body: I mean that far more men pursue things and develop their intelligence (at least on the left-brained side of things), while girls tend to think mostly about dress, makeup, instagram, gossip, etc. and also have less pressure to succeed because a man will likely provide for them anyway. Even if they do, for this reason they are less likely to go public about it and win awards and recognition and such, as they have less need to earn money from it. So you have to limit your sample to people who are equally invested in the same types of tasks. When you do that, the women almost always outperform the men the same way men crush them in athletics. And that is a completely rational conclusion. For an example, look at @sfrohne (cqtz/cqtz- on reddit), who posts almost entirely original content, including the stuff that looks like a team of professionals did it over time, she just did it herself real quick. And in almost every subject too. I never see men like this, even if they are damn good at something, it's still not god-level and usually not in more than a few different subjects, and takes a lot more time and effort for them to get to that level. But I've seen several women like this even though they're rare. For a direct comparison I have very similar interests as this person and even in places where I have 10x more experience than her she is light years ahead of me. The problem, I think, is guys mostly lack the intuition and creativity that is typical of girls, as they are the physical and leading type rather than the thinking and feeling ones. They can find a strategic method to try and imitate something and get close enough after a long time, but it still won't beat pure inborn abilities and extra brain functions (men actually do have smaller brains, especially on the right side, and can't even use many of the brain functions that women can) provided that the latter at all fosters it (which again, most girls don't in many areas, but when they do it's insane).

parent.body:
Yeah because all most of them care about is makeup and gossiping. Nearly every single time one of them is actually productive they excel ahead of the men. In every school and college I've seen the girls in the advanced classes have no trouble solving some of the problems that absolutely stump the guys, even though there's more of the latter. Obviously if you have 1000 boys and only 100 girls there will be more of everything from the boys. So yeah there are more male geniuses because they have a higher participation in that, but the few women top them. If you limit your sample to girls who act like they're from the same planet as us I guarantee you they will be the smarter ones (just look at ruqqus even, @sfrohne, @no_chill, @stars_in_blue_major, @LlamaBean, @AngstKitten, @Madje, etc; ruqqus is more attractive to men so the girly girls won't use it. But with a mostly male userbase I think the top users may even have a slight female majority, simply because they're generally more talented than the guys. Even the ones who aren't top users are still usually smarter and more creative, they just aren't as active (ex. @gaycuttlefish). Another difference I've noted is that some of them produce their own content quite often while the guys almost never do, nor can they produce acceptable results (I've tried). I don't think it's an accident that all the creative endeavors are looked upon as feminine). Brain scans have shown that men not only have less of a brain (especially on the right side) but don't even use as many of the functions they do have. Men are made for laboring, providing, leading, and fighting, which means that they will have good strategy ability as it relates to those tasks but that's about it, everything else is severely limited as it would get in the way. This is kind of obsolete in modern society but men still haven't adapted. It essentially boils down to the hard work vs talent debate, men are usually more hard working but the women have more raw talent. If the latter doesn't work hard then the former will be able to beat them, but if it works even a little bit hard the former will be working their tail off and not even come close.

And no, I never denied that men and women are fundamentally different, that's literally my whole point. Men are built for more physical roles in society while women are suited for the intellectual and creative ones. Those are completely opposite functions, to the point where they're basically mutually exclusive.

body:
Here's just one, but there's tons of others: https://www.thegreatcoursesdaily.com/how-do-the-brains-of-men-and-women-differ/

Of course it tries to be PC and say the differences are a "myth" even though it literally shows how different they are. And that yes, men don't have or use as much of a brain, because for their traditional role in society they don't need to. Areas of the brain that control cognitive abilities are much larger in women. Men generally only use the left side of their brain, and do not have good connectivity with the right side but women do. So in a nutshell women have the right-brained abilities without any cost to the left brained ones, and on top of that the cognitive areas of their brains are larger and more prioritized than in men. Men can use the strategic functions they do have to come up with a way to do some things, but it still never beats having both areas and stronger cognitive abilities. Men's brains are optimized more to make quick decisions, clear out unnecessary information, not think or feel too much, and be able to provide, defend, and lead. This comes at an immense cost to other talents. Also worth noting is that children seem to all have a lot of brilliance in them, but during puberty the boys usually lose it whereas the girls do not (until they become obsessed with makeup and instagram that is, but that's an external factor and the ones who don't do that keep it). This cannot be explained by social factors, as people who do not care (like me) still lose it and are desperate to get it back. A lot of this is also down to genetics in general but I don't doubt that there's a sex component too.

Edit: yep, seems I was right about the puberty thing too. This one says the differences were not as prominent in children: https://www.theatlantic.com/health/archive/2013/12/male-and-female-brains-really-are-built-differently/281962/

Looks like I had a taste of a gifted mind for a short time but I'm now screwed forever and ever.

body: You obviously didn't even read it because that's exactly what it says. Men excel at certain spatial and planning tasks that they need for fighting, for the rest women are superior and even the ones they're not can easily be explained by differing interests (which is also biological but it can have exceptions as it's not fundamental). Men are *not* the thinkers and feelers and this has always been the stereotype, which I believe is accurate, and considering the natural roles of the sexes it makes perfect sense why this would be the case. Kind of funny how a lot of it begins at puberty too. Men historically have been the creators but that's just how society worked for most of history. Women in almost every case I've seen are generally superior in that regard. I am not alone in thinking this, it is well known that male brains are significantly more lateralized than female ones, specifically for certain left-brained skills, which strengthens those a little but hampers everything else. However historically men could afford this as those were all they needed for their traditionally more physical tasks. They needed better motor skills but did not need to be very smart, in fact their brains are hardwired to rest as much as possible as not to waste precious energy.

body: Women aren't more skilled, they are only more talented. Despite that talent will always beat hard work by a large margin, hard work will still beat talent if talent isn't cultivated at all. And this is often the case with girls, for two reasons. One, they are not expected to succeed because it is accepted for them to be taken care of as adults, and like most people they don't bother if they don't have to. The bigger, biological explanation is that men are usually more ambitious as I said before, and this is necessary for leading and persevering through hard times, however it can cross over into other domains.

body: I think you're confusing talent and skill. Talent is the natural ability you have and what your max potential is, ie what you're *capable* of achieving. Skill is what you actually *do* achieve. Typically women have more of the former but little of the latter, however this is important because when you do get an ambitious woman she will have both. You also seem to think people are either black or white, that superior in one way means superior in every way, but that is not so. Men are clearly superior in athletics for example, and leadership, and being rational and well-grounded, and ambition and toughness (both mental and physical). However they are also inferior with regards to intelligence and creating things. The reverse is true for women.

body: This is a subjective article that looks more like a list of the most famous people rather than the smartest ones, and 90% of the people in it are from before women were allowed any active presence in society. It was not uncommon for a husband to present and assume credit for his wife's work because otherwise it wouldn't have been allowed. On top of that men are more likely to pursue monetary success and fame because of their desire to lead and much larger competitive edge, which means naturally they become more well known, whereas women are more likely to engage in something just for fun and personal pleasure. In modern times Marilyn vos Savant is widely regarded as the smartest person alive and also holds the world record IQ.

body: See that's just the thing though, they *are* better for modern jobs because modern jobs depend more on brain than body, and women simply have superior brains to men. It's been scientifically proven that they use more of their brain and that they are more sophisticated in general, whereas men are more formulaic and simple-minded. Even though girls tend to go after "girly" interests and don't usually develop as many skills as boys outside of their particular hobbies (because society allows this assuming they will find a man to take care of them), the potential is there. Meanwhile, the boys *must* succeed or they will be punished, and they also have a bigger edge for competition and success. So as adults it seems like the boys are smarter, but in reality they just work more and are too over-represented to try and draw fair stats from the working population. Girls are proven to naturally have way more talent than boys in nearly every single subject, even math and science despite it being more of a boy thing that seems to scare girls away. Think back to ancient times when the woman needed to be taking care of and entertaining the child, while the man risked his life to go out hunting and fighting for his family and tribe. Obviously having a bright and happy mind is vital for the former role, whereas the latter doesn't take too much thought, just spatial and motor skills and aggression. This is why before entering the workforce the boys are usually seen in sports and roughhousing, while the girls do more art and music and get better grades. They simply have two different skillsets, boys physical/spatial and competitive and girls mental and social. This probably explains why 3x as many men commit suicide, as their mental health is not as much of a priority at a biological level, even though more women are diagnosed with depression and emotional disorders because they're better at expressing it (and also society sees it as normal in boys, because it is, and often punishes them for complaining about it while girls are encouraged to seek help for even the most minor struggles).
